Breaking the Silence: General Info
Band Members
Sarah Anthony - Vocals
Mark Anthony - Vocals and Guitar
Matt Beal - Bass
Adam DeFrank - Drums
Breaking the Silence is a new christian rock band from Uniontown, PA. They released their debut album in April, and although unsigned they were produced by Travis Wyrick. They will be touring the U.S. through the fall.
For booking information please call (724)366-4644 or e-mail us at breakingthesilencemusic@msn.com.
For more info and music samples go to: www.breakingthesilenceonline.com
1. Ephesians 6:18 - Be faithful in prayer
2. Ephesians 4:1 - Use your God given gifts
3. Colossians 3:11 - There is nothing more important than God
4. Psalm 150 - Praise God with joyful noise
